name: The Metalchemist
description:
Welcome to the Cogscar, city of innovation and metallurgy! You are the Metalchemist, a metallurgist who uses alchemy and metals of all sorts to fit and satisfy their clients needs! Smelt and sell to grow your shop and become the best Metalchemist you can be!

Grab, Mix and Smelt

Drag one or more Ores from the shelf into the foundry to make alloy ingots that can satisfy your client's needs! The properties of each Ore contribute to the properties of the casted alloy.

Watch the Heat

Increase the foundry's heat by activating the bellows. Try to stay in the safe zone until the reaction finishes to cast the purest alloy!



Use Reagents

Reagents help you altering and controlling the smelting process to save your precious alloys!

Sell your Ingots

Customers of all sorts will express their needs for certain alloys. Tailor your smelting skills and casted ingots to their specific needs. Put your casted ingot on the weighing balance to check its properties. If you want to sell it, place it into the area next to the balance.

Buy new Reagents

The Alchemist will visit your Shop from time to time. Buy their Reagents to make your tough alloys easier to craft and smelt at the highest purity.

One compendium to cast 'em all

Don't hesitate to check "The Smeltonomicon" for more in-depth information on each Ores' properties and how Reagents influence the smelting process!
